title: Quick And Easy Low Content Book Research - Publisher Rocket update

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Down
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify high-demand, low-competition keywords by analyzing search volume and competitive scores.
steps: Filter results by search volume and competitive score
Niche down to specific terms (e.g., 'gratitude journal for black women')
Prioritize green-coded keywords with moderate competition
caveats: Avoid overly broad terms with high competition
source_quotes: 'we can take a broad term like gratitude journal type it into the search box'

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Validation
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify keywords with high search volume and low competition for book titles.
steps: Filter results by green estimated searches and competitive scores
Prioritize niches with moderate competition and reasonable search volume
caveats: Does not guarantee sales, requires additional market validation
source_quotes: 'gratitude journal for teens has the best competitive score'

heuristics.name: Color-Coded Priority
heuristics.condition: If keyword is green-coded (high search volume) and yellow-coded (moderate competition), prioritize for publishing
source_quotes: 'this has a search an estimated search of 6682 which is very high it's also green'

heuristics.name: Low Competition Filter
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is low and search volume is sufficient, prioritize the niche

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket now supports multi-market research (US, UK, Germany) for low-content books
source_quotes: 'you can also research the uk and the german market'

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket identifies niches with both demand and low competition for KDP books
source_quotes: 'this is the way i do my research'

niche_patterns.description: Combine demographic identity with specific problem and niche constraint to reduce competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets underserved audiences while maintaining search volume
source_quotes: 'blessed a gratitude journal for black women now that is very specific'
